To be the front liner in safeguarding animal health and public safety, promoting animal welfare, and encouraging clientele to adopt new technologies in animal production in support of the economic and food security program of our government.
A healthy and productive animal populace in the city thru the initiative and support of our local government to safeguard animal health promote animal welfare, assure public safety on safe and wholesome meat and a community aware on responsible pet ownership.
An increasing level of animal protection against priority diseases as well as to assure public safety and protection thru meat inspection and awareness on the importance of rabies and also to promote scientific livestock and poultry production.
Mondays to Saturdays\n8:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Phone Numbers:\n0933-995-6566 / 0966-318-1892

By deleting your account, you won\'t be able to login to, recover your account or access your account information. This action is final and can\'t be undone.\n

It seems like you are trying to access a deactivated account. Activating this account again will require administrator\'s approval.
The Silong App is under maintenance for the time being. We\'re upgrading our system to improve our service. Thanks for your patience!
Deactivating your account means...\n\n-You may no longer view the adoption listing.\n-Your data and account will not be completely deleted from the database.\n -You cannot create another account under the same email address.\n-and Activating your account again will require approval from the administrators.\n\nDo you want to continue?\n

Congratulations! Your request is under review by the City Veterinary Office. Please wait for approval status within 1 to 3 working days. We have received your request. Please wait for approval status within 1 to 3 working days. Your request has been APPROVED! Please set an appointment for your City Veterinary Office visit.\n\nNote:\nThe office reserves the right to reschedule the appointment without prior notice. Checking the Clinic\'s availability Appointment Confirmed! Your appointment is on \n\nPlease bring the following:\n\n\t- 2x2 ID Picture\n\t- Cage or Leash (Kulungan o Tali)\n\t- Valid ID You have successfully completed the adoption process. \n\nNOTICE:\nPlease be informed that a household can only adopt at most two dogs or any number of cats as long as the pets\' welfare are guaranteed. \n\nPAUNAWA: \nAng bawat pamilya ay maaari lamang mag-ampon ng hanggang dalawang aso o higit pang bilang ng pusa hangga\'t masisiguro ang kapakanan ng mga alagang hayop.
